job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity paypal nasdaq pypl is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy our open digital payments platform gives paypals million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways whether they are online on a mobile device in an app or in person through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships paypal creates better ways to manage and move money and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments paying or getting paid available in more than markets around the world the paypal platform including braintree venmo and xoom enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than currencies withdraw funds in currencies and hold balances in their paypal accounts in currenciesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtjob description summaryltbrgtltstronggtwe are hiring for a data scientist someone who will build data products to improve our operational efficiency and enable datadriven capacity planningltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtjob descriptionltbrgtltstronggtour global sales transformation is in full swing we embarked on a path of transforming and building a world class sales organization earlier this year our team helps to power paypals high growth sales organization by delivering actionable insights and business intelligence at scale to all levels of the business our customers our frontline sales teams and our executive leadership team in this role you will lead a team to develop solutions for complex ambiguous and highvisibility business challenges you will set and execute on a vision for your team that reflects your deep analytical expertise you will be a thought partner to sales leadership teams you will partner with these teams to understand the insights they require to manage and grow their business and leverage crossfunctional teams to develop and land solutions that meet their needs at scale you are deeply curious and persistent in gaining knowledge about our products and gotomarket strategy you will have exposure and visibility to paypal sales executives as you work with them to understand their needs and promote solutions that your team developsltbrgtltbrgtwe are a team of entrepreneurial enthusiastic and clientfocused members if you are a fast learner are willing to learn and grow have a cando attitude and wants to solve problems in the most pragmatic way we would like to talk with youltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt design and implement scalable datadriven systems that increase sales successltligtltligt use design thinking to create intuitive interfaces that allow sales users to integrate data products as a natural part of their everyday workflowltligtltligt work ee with crossfunctional software engineering operations data science and project management teams to build robust and statistically rigorous productsltligtltligt build frameworks that synthesize complex hierarchies and multiple data streams into tractable signals and metricsltligtltligt identify opportunities to build and reuse data or software modules to accelerate product developmentltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtminimum qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt msphd degree in statistics mathematics applied mathematics computer science operations research engineering economicsltligtltligt years of experience as a full stack data scientistltligtltligt experience in querying and manipulating raw datasets in sqlpython or etl pipelinesltligtltligt experience with data modeling machine learning algorithms and data science techniquesltligtltligt experience building deploying and maintaining data products using tools such as gcp h rest apis airflow etcltligtltligt experience explaining technical concepts and analysis implications to varied audiences and translating business objectives into analysesltligtltligt experience working independently and as a member of a crossfunctional teamltligtltligt experience with salesforce data and terminology good to haveltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtwere a purposedriven company whose beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day we hold ourselves to our one team behaviors which demand that we hold the highest ethical standards to empower an open and diverse workplace and strive to treat everyone who is touched by our business with dignity and respect our employees challenge the status quo ask questions and find solutions we want to break down barriers to financial empowerment join us as we change the way the world defines financial freedomltbrgtltbrgtpaypal provides equal employment opportunity eeo to all persons regardless of age color national origin citizenship status physical or mental disability race religion
